title: Product Leader Getting Started Guide to DataTools Pro
excerpt: Get started managing and analyzing your metadata with DataTools Pro
content_markdown:
Thank you for signing up for DataTools Pro! As a product leader, we understand first hand why it's so important to have quality reference materials to capture and distribute knowledge across your organization. We hope to be a quick and easy solution for you to monitor, document, and understand not only the Salesforce data model but the business critical metrics and KPIs powered by your Salesforce reports and dashboards.

## Step 1 Connect your Salesforce Objects

The first step to using DataTools Pro dictionary and entity relationship diagrams is to add Salesforce objects.

Click on the **"Guided Tour"** button above for a step by step walkthrough.
